doc.title: Welcome
doc.description:
This is a basic demo app, running on top of a Solid pod. You can use it to explore links about Solid and related subjects. Click on tags to filter the list.

As well as introducing Solid, the app has links to broader subjects such as linked data, web services, open data sources and data visualisation.

It is set up as a Progressive Web App to give an offline experience on mobile devices. Solid provides the app with https services, user authentication and data storage.

The example app files are on GitHub, together with an explanation of the choices made. My personal website is at neilrae.com
